name: The Haunted Drive Home: Charlie's Horror
name_original: The Haunted Drive Home: Charlie's Horror
description:
Hello all! First thank you for checking my game out! The Haunted Drive Home : Charlie's Horror has a horror setting and is made up of pixel art 3D assets. For the most part it is an FPS but it has puzzle elements. I developed this game with my step daughter and some of the art and art direction is her work. I also used some art from art packs made by VexedEnigma/PixelJustice found here https://malibudarby.itch.io/. I also use Audio from https://jdbartist.itch.io/ and https://joelsteudler.itch.io/.

It is a short game will take most people probably anywhere from 20 mins to an hour to complete. If you have any questions or issues from not installing to a bug you find please let me know and I will help/fix when I can. Thank you! And I hope you enjoy! Take care! P.S. this is a windows only  game with mouse and keyboard controls. Will try and add gamepad support in the future.
